title: "Modeling Exersice"
output: html_notebook

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
#library(tidymodels)
library(corrr)
library(titanic)
```


1. Use the `corrr` package to explore the correlations in the `titanic_train` set

```{r}
titanic_train %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  correlate() %>%
  network_plot()

titanic_train %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  correlate() %>%
  rearrange() %>%
  shave() %>%
  rplot()
```
